definition: Company level emission factor of the technology
Flag if company is the ultimate parent in our database
The financial instrument-specific id that defines the company (or corporate bond pool)
Company level production of the technology
The units that production is measured in
Sector to which the asset belongs
Year at which the production value is predicted
Name of the ID provided in the id column. The id is used for mapping of the dataset to a given portfolio (for credit: company_name for corporate bonds: corporate_ticker for equity: bloomberg_id)
The units that the emission factor is measured in
Abbreviation of the scenario pathway name (e.g. Sustainable Development Scenario is sds)
The region of the production (from the asset location). It is aggregated to the regions given by the scenarios to allow the application of the regional scenario pathway
The source publication from which the scenario was taken
